pages.text: $(thing)Health:$() 100     $(br) $(thing)Attack Damage:$() 7     $(br) $(thing)Behavior:$() Aggressive     $(br) $(thing)Spawn:$() $(l)Nether() $(br) $(thing)Description:$() $(br)Wanders around the nether to scare the humans. It is very slow but deals a lot of damage. It can only be hurt by a special enchantment called $(item)Demon Slayer$().
